comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of hours the northern factory is run and y be the number of hours the western factory is run, both integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "800x + 650y \geq 800,000",
        "700x + 750y \geq 700,000",
        "40x + 35y \leq 60,000",
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize Z = x + y"
}
